name: Stickman Freekick Soccer Hero
description:
Flick with one finger and score to prove that you°Øre the king of the field!

The best real soccer physics experience is here in this brand new arcade free kick game with next-gen graphics and easy to use controls.

Now you can prove you are the flicking legend! Beat the stickman goal keeper and score as many goals as you can!

Playing soccer (football) was never so fun! You will be amazed by how fun shooting an amazing free kick into the top corner.

How to Play:
- Flick the ball to kick it out

Game Features:
- Realistic kick and Flick controls!
- Realistic soccer physics engine
- Cool stickamn animations
- Amazing 3D Graphics effects

Let's be a super stickman soccer star!
